text:
Ah, good work, Koito!
The stage was really lively.

E-Everyone...
seemed to enjoy listening to my stories...

Yeah, even for local performances,
there should be many people who came to see you, Koito.

While they might have enjoyed hearing about the local area,
they probably also wanted to hear about you, Koito.

I want to gain more and more experience
as an idol...!

About myself...
I want to be able to talk about myself more and more...!
